There are researchers, cynics, and believers.

Cynics just disparage, and t=
ake little account of other opinions.=C2=A0=C2=A0 They often come across as=
 arrogant when their beliefs are challenged.=C2=A0 They change topics when =
challenged or asked to consider objective testing, and accuse and insult ot=
hers.=C2=A0 

Researchers may or may not agree.=C2=A0 They are willing to a=
ccept evidence for, and evidence against.=C2=A0 They are willing to change =
their opinion when the evidence supports it.=C2=A0 They are not afraid to c=
hallenge statements, and are not afraid to have their own challenged.=C2=A0=
 They value testing.

Believers seem to be at the other end of the spectrum=
 as cynics.=C2=A0 They take little account of other opinions. They often co=
me across as arrogant when their beliefs are challenged.=C2=A0 
They change=
 topics when challenged or asked to consider objective 
testing, and accuse=
 and insult others.=C2=A0 

So in fact, Believers and Cynics are really the=
 same, just with different beliefs.

      =C2=A0It still comes across as arrogant debunking.=
 It's implying all EVP/ITC is just the mind making sense out of meaningless=
 patterns. It's not doing any research or recordings, but sitting back tell=
ing the rest of us what is really going on in our heads. it's having these =
wierd little two way conversions as if y'all know so much better--You and A=
pril

=C2=A0
=C2=A0F-S

On Wed, May 26, 2010 at 8:24 AM, Rj <rasterer@yahoo. com> wrote:


=
=C2=A0 







Frank, try not to be so defensive when someone disagrees wit=
h you.

Not all alternate opinions are 'debunking". Discussion, different p=
rocesses, different viewpoints, all add to research.=C2=A0 Everyone marchin=
g to the same tune, and all agreeing, doesn't.


If you want to say people =
hear different things because of individualized messages, or psychic compon=
ents, nothing is stopping you.=C2=A0 If someone else wants to say there is =
no psychic component, and that telling someone what they should hear can ca=
use bias, they should be free to. 


The brave ones will test their claims.=
=C2=A0 Those who make claims, and insist they cannot be tested.. well... "m=
ost of us are smart enough to know" (your term) what that really means. 


=

=

g real going on.=C2=A0=C2=A0
=C2=A0
=C2=A0Who needs this constant --this is=
 what you're really hearing-- BS explanations?=C2=A0 
=C2=A0
=C2=A0EVP is f=
ar more complicated than just cut and dried sounds, there=C2=A0is psychic c=
omponent, where you're using the sound as a psychic prop for your own sense=
s. There's the messages tuned to a specific individual, so no one is going =
ot hear it the same if at all. Everyone is wired different, and just becaus=
e no two poeple hear an EVP the same does not invalidate it. 

=C2=A0
=C2=
=A0Maybe you should go debunk music, no one hears songs the same either.

Seems to me.
